p:
On February 19, the NHC published the 6th edition of Guideline on diagnosis and treatment of COVID‐19 ( the 6th Guideline for COVID‐19).
23 This document asserted that the transmission of SARS‐CoV‐2 mainly occurs via large droplets and contact. Additionally, the virus may spread in an unventilated environment with high levels of viral aerosols.
